summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3790 for the improvement of West 60th Street from 32nd Avenue Northwest to a point approximately 400 feet west of 36th Avenue Northwest; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46706, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
